name: Lamb Kofta
description: Spiced Mediterranean lamb meatballs. Tender, flavorful, and perfect for grilling.

instructions.instruction: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix thoroughly with your hands until spices are evenly distributed.
instructions.tip: Knead for at least 5 minutes for better texture.

instructions.instruction: Form walnut-sized portions into elongated kofta shapes or thread onto skewers.
Preheat grill or grill pan over high heat.
Grill 3-4 minutes per side, 12-15 minutes total.
instructions.tip: Don't flip too often - let them develop a nice crust.

tips: Lamb has enough fat - no extra oil needed.
Soak wooden skewers in water before grilling.
storageInfo: Raw mixture keeps 2 days, cooked kofta 3 days refrigerated.
servingSuggestion: Serve with lavash, hummus, tabbouleh and yogurt sauce.
variations: Use ground beef as an alternative.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes instead of grilling.
Sprinkle sumac for a tangy twist.
